name: OCKAppearanceStyle
desc: A concrete object that controls appearance constants.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new appearance style with default values.

items.name: var borderWidth1: CGFloat
items.desc: A border width of 2.0 points, by default.

items.name: var borderWidth2: CGFloat
items.desc: A thin border width of 1.0 points, by default.

items.name: var cornerRadius1: CGFloat
items.desc: A round corner radius of 15.0, by default.

items.name: var cornerRadius2: CGFloat
items.desc: A corner radius of 10.0, by default.

items.name: var shadowOffset1: CGSize
items.desc: The distance from the UI element to the shadow.

items.name: var shadowOpacity1: Float
items.desc: The amount of transparency shadows have, where 0.0 is fully transparent and 1.0 is completely opaque.

items.name: var shadowRadius1: CGFloat
items.desc: The blur radius, in points, used to render the shadow.

items.name: var lineWidth1: CGFloat
items.desc: The width of stroked path lines.

items.name: var opacity1: CGFloat
items.desc: The amount of transparency for a UI element, where 0.0 is fully transparent and 1.0 is completely opaque.
